mapper.sql: id,customerId,customerName, template_code, template_name, template_type, biz_type_code, subject_id,bill_way_code, storage_template_type,remark, param1, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, quotation_no
mapper.select:
select
from price_general_template where id=#{id} order by create_time desc,id desc
mapper.insert: insert into price_general_template(customerId,customerName,template_code,template_name, template_type, biz_type_code, subject_id, bill_way_code,storage_template_type,remark, param1, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, quotation_no) values ( #{customerId},#{customerName}, #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billWayCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageTemplateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quotationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
